mapper.sql: id, outstock_no, customerid,customer_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, deliverid, deliver_name, waybill_no, waybill_num, waybill_list, total_weight, adjust_weight, warehouse_code, service_type_code, dispatch_type_code, collect_money, month_fee_count, is_calculated, send_name, send_province_id, send_city_id, send_district_id, send_street, send_detail_address, receive_name, receive_province_id, receive_city_id, receive_district_id, receive_street, receive_detail_address, receive_time, fees_no, account_state,external_no,sign_time,accept_time, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, write_time, calculate_time, del_flag, total_volume , temperature_type_code, temperature_type_name, remark, zexpressnum, bigstatus, smallstatus, system_weight, totalqty, product_detail, expresstype, sku_num, extattr1, extattr2, extattr3, extattr4, extattr5,workcount,adjust_deliverid,adjust_deliver_name,adjust_carrier_id, adjust_carrier_name,timeliness,adjust_province_id,adjust_city_id,adjust_district_id
mapper.select: select a.*, s.servicename as servicename from biz_dispatch_pay_bill a LEFT JOIN pub_carrier_servicetype s on a.service_type_code=s.servicecode and a.carrier_id=s.carrierid and s.delflag='0' where 1=1

select a.warehouse_code as warehouseCode,a.customer_name as customerName,a.carrier_name as carrierName,a.receive_province_id as receiveProvinceId,a.receive_city_id as receiveCityId,a.receive_district_id as receiveDistrictId,count(DISTINCT a.waybill_no) as extattr1 from biz_dispatch_pay_bill a where 1=1
GROUP BY a.warehouse_code,a.customer_name,a.carrier_name,a.receive_province_id,a.receive_city_id,a.receive_district_id

select a.warehouse_code as warehouseCode,a.customer_name as customerName,a.carrier_name as carrierName,count(DISTINCT a.waybill_no) as extattr1 from biz_dispatch_pay_bill a where 1=1
GROUP BY a.warehouse_code,a.customer_name,a.carrier_name

select a.waybill_no from biz_dispatch_pay_bill a inner join fees_pay_dispatch b on a.fees_no = b.fees_no inner join fees_pay_bill c on b.bill_no = c.bill_no and c.del_flag = 0 where a.del_flag = 0
LIMIT 1

select a.waybill_no from biz_dispatch_pay_bill a where a.del_flag = 0 and a.is_calculated = 1
LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update biz_dispatch_pay_bill a set a.is_calculated = 99 where a.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into biz_dispatch_pay_bill(outstock_no, external_no, waybill_no, fees_no, waybill_num, waybill_list, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, deliverid, deliver_name, total_weight, adjust_weight, total_volume, service_type_code, dispatch_type_code, collect_money, month_fee_count, send_name, send_province_id, send_city_id, zexpressnum, bigstatus, smallstatus, system_weight, totalqty, product_detail, expresstype, sku_num, extattr1, extattr2, extattr3, extattr4, extattr5) values ( #{outstockNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{externalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waybillList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.select:
SELECT * from biz_dispatch_pay_bill where del_flag='0' and waybill_no in
#{item}
SELECT count(b.id) as num from biz_dispatch_pay_bill b LEFT JOIN fees_pay_dispatch f on b.waybill_no = f.waybill_no where f.status = '1' and b.waybill_no = #{waybillNo}
